item.description:
Learn Creative Financing Techniques.
Alan Kosinski will be our guest speaker.

Live Event at the Crowne Plaza Hotel in Natick, MA

Tuesday; August 12th - 7:00pm

RSVP to reserve your seat: Metro West Investors Live Event

Does the "Credit Crunch" have you worried about buying a home or investment property?
Our event on August 12th will focus on Creative Financing techniques. Alan Kosinski has actually bought hundreds of properties using these very techniques and he is going to teach them to everyone who attends in Natick, MA on Tuesday night.

Millions of dollars or completely empty, no matter what your bank account looks like, Alan will share with us, financing techniques that can make us thousands and thousands of dollars. Anyone who is interested in maximizing their money's potential, for buying a home or investment property, should attend this meeting.

group.name: Metro West Investors - Boston area Real Estate Group

item.name: Creative Financing for Investment Properties
